abstract: South Carolina’s Supreme Court, ruling in a case tied to the debate over the distribution of the singer James Brown’s estate, has upheld the right of a reporter to publish excerpts from the diary of Mr. Brown’s wife.

headline.main: Court Upholds Right of Reporter to Publish Excerpts From Diary of James Brown’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Diary of Brown’s Widow Can Be Published

snippet: South Carolina’s Supreme Court, ruling in a case tied to the debate over the distribution of the singer James Brown’s estate, has upheld the right of a reporter to publish excerpts from the diary of Mr. Brown’s wife.
